6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"There are two prayers that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) never neglected to pray them in my house secretly nor publicly: Two Rak'ahs before Fajr and two Rak'ahs after 'Asr

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الْعَصْرِ
